summary: Shruti and Bittoo become partners in their very own "Wedding planning ka bijness" in Delhi and in the process discover friendship, love and one another.
cast: Ranveer Singh|Anushka Sharma|Ranjit Batra|Manu Rishi Chadha|Manish Chaudhary|Sushil Dahiya|Shena Gamat|Andrew Hoffland|Manit Joura|Kanksha|Alok Kumar|Govind Pandey|Karan Sagoo|Shirina Sambyal|Chetan Sharma|Revant Shergill|Manmeet Singh|Neeraj Sood|Tariq Vasudeva
title: Band Baaja Baaraat
